structure.unit: LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GAS AND OTHER FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS

text.section: Any person who violates any of the provisions of KRS 234.100 to 234.160 shall be guilty of a violation.

Any person who violates any regulation promulgated under provisions of KRS 234.100 to 234.160 and after having been given notice to cease and desist, unless said violation is corrected within ten (10) days, shall be guilty of a violation.

When any person violates any provision of KRS 234.100 to 234.180 or regulations, which violation constitutes a public danger, an immediate notice to cease and desist may be issued, and failure to comply with notice shall be guilty of a violation.
Any person violating the provisions of KRS 234.200 to 234.260 shall be guilty of a Class B misdemeanor.
Any firm or corporation violating the provisions of KRS 234.200 to 234.260 shall be guilty of a violation.
Any person violating any provision of KRS 234.430 shall be guilty of a Class A misdemeanor. Upon conviction of a second offense, he shall be guilty of a Class D felony.

Any person violating any provision of KRS 234.190 shall be guilty of a Class B misdemeanor. Upon conviction of a second offense, and subsequent offenses, the violator shall be guilty of a Class A misdemeanor.

law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 44, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992; and ch. 463, sec. 27, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 122, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 138, sec. 12; and ch. 176, sec. 16. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 8. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 8. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 216, sec. 6.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/14/92). This section was amended by two 1992 Acts which do not appear to be in conflict and have been compiled together.
